title: Game Freezing after Microsoft update
body: The game will freeze after i load into the rift and crash my computer. I've had this happen to me 2 times now and got the afk buster crap on me. I don't know what i can do but i cant play the game anymore. Can anyone help me figure out what is wrong with the new Microsoft update that maybe causing this happen to me?

replies.body:
If you're on Windows 10, this is probs related to the Xbox app change that enabled Game DVR for everyone. I suggest [disabling the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it quickly fixes this for you.

Let me know if that did the trick!

This issue has been happening to me an incredible amount as well. Often in the loading screen as well. It has gotten to the point where I am now put in a low priority queue by Leaver Buster. I just want to enjoy a good league game....
